title: Context
description: Any arbitrary contextual information regarding the event, captured by the agent, optionally provided by the user

custom.description: An arbitrary mapping of additional metadata to store with the event.

finished.description: A boolean indicating whether the response was finished or not

headers.description: A mapping of HTTP headers of the response object

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

user.description: Describes the correlated user for this event. If user data are provided here, all user related information from metadata is ignored, otherwise the metadata's user information will be stored with the event.

referer.description: RUM specific field that stores the URL of the page that 'linked' to the current page.

url.description: RUM specific field that stores the URL of the current page

service.description: Service related information can be sent per event. Provided information will override the more generic information from metadata, non provided fields will be set according to the metadata information.
